Row.Text: Breathtaking tiles receive +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith form each type of adjacent Mountain or Water terrain; +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith if the tile has unimproved Forest.[NEWLINE]Pastures and Plantations triggers Culture Bombs, and +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture per turn.
Mondstadt unique recon unit that replaces the Skirmisher. Available from the start of the game. Can scale cliff walls, +1 [ICON_Movement] Movement when staring turns on Hills.

Replaces the Government Plaza and cheaper to build. Provides regional Defence equal to an Encampment.[NEWLINE]Cities on the same continent with your original [ICON_Capital] Capital gain +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities whenever you are not at war with any civilization.

Genshin Impact unique building that replaces the Monument. Provides an additional +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE]Units instantly heals when moved to a Statue of the Seven. The healing power of the statue is 25 per turn.

Unlocks the Builder ability to constrcut a Adventurers' Guild, unique to Genshin Impact.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Production] Production. +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold and Appeal to adjacent tiles. One per city. Tiles with Adventurers' Guild cannot be swapped.
All units +1 [ICON_Movement] movement +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength in Dark Ages. All tiles +1 Appeal in Golden Ages.
All Cities have access to fresh water. -3% Naturalist and Rock Band [ICON_Faith] purchase cost for each Shrine in the empire. (up to -30%)
Land units receive +100% Support Bonus in combat. Cities with garrisoned units +1 Amenities, +10% [ICON_Production] Production.
